tombofthedruids.name: Tomb of the Druids
tombofthedruids.flavor: read aloud text to read to the players when they uncover it and are about to travel to it/ or text upon exiting the portal
tombofthedruids.description: Basalt tomb shaped by swarms of reprogrammed stone-regurgitating nematodes. Contains the bio-uplifted remains of legendary eco-hacking liches from ages past.

encounters.description: With a deep bass rumble, a swarm of *creatures.lithoformnematodes* squidges from a stone wall.
The time has come. The sarcophagus opens, and the *creatures.mantidbiolich* emerges to face the enemies of their people once more.

events: Slip and release chemicals into the environment. +1 disruption.
